Advanced data
NPC ID3216

The Melee combat tutor (named Harlan) is one of the three basic instructors found on a small hill outside of Lumbridge Castle. New players who talk to him can acquire a training sword as well as a training shield to use, but are only good for recently created characters. If a player has achieved 99 Defence, they can purchase a Defence cape and its respective hood from him for 99,000 coins.

The melee instructor is close to Wilfred, the master of Woodcutting.

Stock[edit | edit source]

Note: If a player has multiple 99s, they will receive the trimmed variant of the cape instead.

ItemPrice
sold at
Defence cape 99,000

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • His platebody looks very similar to White decorative body, but the colours are reversed. The platelegs are almost identical with White decorative legs.
